rows.label: qst202103_msg001
rows.name:
Ooh!? Ooooooh!
There was some reaction!

rows.label: qst202103_msg002
rows.name:
With this, the riddle of
the stone tablet is solved!

rows.label: qst202103_msg003
rows.name:
Ah, but it seems I can't
say it's completely solved yet.

rows.label: qst202103_msg005
rows.name:
Apparently, this stone tablet
is indicating the World Tree.

rows.label: qst202103_msg006
rows.name:
A part of it seems to be
glowing somehow, but[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202103_msg007
rows.name:
Yes, exactly! As expected of Meleph,
you have an eye for good details.

rows.label: qst202103_msg008
rows.name:
By solving the riddle of the stone
tablet, this light appeared.

rows.label: qst202103_msg009
rows.name:
The location is probably
the Data Management
Room in the World Tree[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202103_msg010
rows.name:
I think it means that if we go there,
there's something[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202103_msg011
rows.name:
Meaning we won't know unless
we actually go there, right?

rows.label: qst202103_msg016
rows.name:
No, going to the World Tree alone
is actually dangerous!

rows.label: qst202103_msg017
rows.name: Let's hurry and chase after her.
